pr_title: WFLY-14218 Non-HA server configuration variants use wrong distributable-web feature group

timeline.bodyText:
This comment is just a note for the record in case someone someday investigates this PR, or someone else reviews it now.
The two attributes that are removed above are not valid for the resource being configured. This had gone undiscovered because this feature group was never used prior to Paul's work on this issue.
timeline.author: bstansberry
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,10 +15,7 @@
             <param name="cache-container" value="web"/>
             <param name="cache" value="sso"/>
         </feature>
-        <feature spec="subsystem.distributable-web.routing.local">
-            <param name="cache-container" value="web"/>
-            <param name="cache" value="routing"/>
-        </feature>
+        <feature spec="subsystem.distributable-web.routing.local"/>

timeline.message: Legacy feature pack template for distributable-web should reflect galleon feature group variants
Legacy feature pack template for distributable-web should reflect galleon feature group variants
WFLY-14218 Non-HA server configuration variants use wrong distributable-web feature group
Legacy feature pack template for distributable-web should reflect galleon feature group variants
ResponseHeaderAuthenticationTestCase does not require a distributable web application.
ResponseHeaderAuthenticationTestCase does not require a distributable web application.
ResponseHeaderAuthenticationTestCase does not require a distributable web application.
Fix compatibility with distributable-web-local feature group.
